relation: Contact Name
Availity® Client Services To register with Availity or learn more about online services available to BCBSOK providers
BlueCard® Hotline For out-of-state member benefits and eligibility
Behavioral Health Unit For information about BCBSOK's Behavioral Health program (Includes preauthorization)
Care Management Programs
Dental Network of America
Electronic Commerce (E-Commerce) Center For information about EDI (Electronic Data Interchange) transactions, such as electronic claim submission
Fraud Hotline To report concerns to the BCBSOK Special Investigations Department (SID)
Federal Employee Program (FEP) To verify eligibility and benefits and/or check claim status for FEP members FEP Behavioral Health Line
Medical Management Correspondence for Exchange Members

Medical Services For pre-certification of inpatient hospital admissions, including acute care, inpatient rehab, skilled nursing, long-term acute care, inpatient hospice, and coordinated health care such as skilled nursing visits, IV medication, etc.
Preauthorization of Medical Services for Exchange Members
Professional Network Representative For information on how to use online tools, BCBSOK products and initiatives, provider education opportunities and personalized office visits
Provider Access and Servicing Strategy (PASS) Unit For more information on provider education opportunities
Provider Inquiry Unit (PIU) For general assistance on a variety of topics, such as BCBSOK products, claims review requests, claims address, etc.
